about_the_game:
Veteran Package for skilled players!

Included

  • Experience Potion(3 days) : Increase gain EXP
  • Lucky Amulet(3 days) : Increase Rare item drop rate
  • Bag Expand 1EA : Increase character's inventory
  • Safe Expand 1EA : Increase character's personal storage
  • Greater Elixer 10EA : Restroe HP & SD 100%

name: Metal Reaper Online - Veteran Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT440
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
